reviews.review:
★★★★★

클리어하고 나면 좀 똑똑해진 느낌.
Best upcoming game. Like the steam description says, once it comes out I am sure gamers will get hours of unique gameplay out of it.

Hra sa odohráva v takej budove . Skoro celá hra je zkúška a po čase musíte čeliť aj dosť ťažkým hádankám ale stojí to za to si to kúpiť . Hra stojí 9.99 € čo si myslím že je akurát pre túto hru . Nejaký extra dobrý príbeh nehladajte je to skôr hra pri ktorej ztrávite v jednej miestnosti aj pol hodinu aby ste zistili ako sa dostať do ďalšej . Táto hra je dosť krátka ja som ju dohral za 4 hodiny . Dávam tejto hre dobrých 8/10

Jogo top, precisa pensar bastante para decifrar os puzzle.
Recomendo
10/10
partiu jogar o 2
ps: sou o unico que tem medo da voz da mulher q fica falando ;x

THE CAKE IS A LIE!
The Perfect Game. Groundbreaking. An absolute classic.

l'ayant eu pour un euro je trouve cette experience excellente bien qu'un peu courte, je vous conseille d'attendre les soldes et de ne pas payer le prix fort (10 euros il me semble).
Les graphisme sont toujours bon (meme pour un jeu de 2007) 
Le robot apporte grandement au jeu sans lui il serait vraiment bof donc jouer avec le son 
mention spéciale à la musique pour le generique de fin qui pour une fois est interessante bref je recommande mais pas a 10 euros
THE GAME!
EZ
Es un juego que entretiene bastante ,las mecánica no son muy complicadas y posee una gran historio
Un clásico moderno. Jugabilidad, puzzles, historia.. Demasiado corto, pero muy rejugable.
Good
Love this game! This game is so fun.
güzel

Yeah, I'll admit, I see why this is seen to be a classic now. 

It's been sitting in my stream library for a while and only now have I decided to reduce my backlog and play it.
So yeah, pretty sure i'm the only person on the planet who hadn't played it at this point but for anyone who for some reason hasn't done so, I recommend playing this wholeheartedly. 

It's such a fun, lovable puzzle game, and Glados' commentary is just the icing on the cake

NOW ONTO PORTAL 2 I GO.
Muito Bom Mesmo
Fajna gierka
Este juego te hace estar un buen rato pensando como pasar mapas o simplemente obtener la preciada tarta jaja

La verdad...
sin palabras
un juego con muy buena trama, historia, y buenos graficos
un juego que te hara pensar y te hara pasar horas 
5 estrellas para este juego :v
en poca palabras: diviertete pensando
This game can be done in about an hour but its so worth it
Ich Kann das Spiel  nicht Spielen da dann immer eine FehlerMeldung kommt aber da ich Portal2 liebe! Jz scho geiles Game!

Mimo swoich lat Portal trzyma się bardzo dobrze: tak graficznie jak i klimatycznie (czuć powiew HL). Zagadki stoją na dobrym poziomie i potrafią wciągnąć. Ktoś kto lubi je rozwiązywać będzie zadowolony. Po przejściu od razu przychodzi ochota na P2 ;).
Diyalogları aşırı aşırısı eğlenceli bir oyun, bazen puzzle lar kanser etse de kesinlikle satın almaya değecek bi oyun. Oynama konusunda tereddüt ederseniz direkt kırın ve alın!

Pros:
-Gran historia
-Buena jugabilidad
-Es original
-Buena batalla de boss final
-Graficos muy buenos para la epoca en la que fue lanzado
-Muy buena ambientacion
Contras:
-Es muy corto para lo que vale sin embargo aun asi lo recomiendo

Muy bueno, al final tienes  que pelear con nuestro queridisimo GLaDOS.
Los puzzles son desafiantes.
Puedes crear MUCHOS portales, ninguno te lleva a su querido corazon. :(
I liked this game a lot. I found it to be a little short but it was still challenging and a lot of fun to play. If your into puzzle games I would recommend it for sure!

Um jogo bem legal, e aparentemente bem curto.
A historia é interessante mas não é tão cativante quanto a do portal2, mas é um otimo jogo! recomendo.
ps: the cake is a lie.
说起来你可能不信，第15个实验室我就卡住了【在查攻略的边缘试探.jpg】

워낙 유명해서 굳이 말할 필요도 없지만 다시 한번 느끼는 갓갓게임.
FPS같은 퍼즐게임이면서 동시에 어느 정도의 피지컬도 있어야 함.
이리저리 고민하면서 엔딩까지 본 유저라면 분명 포탈2까지 해보고 싶을거라고 확신함.

결론: 볼륨이 크지는 않지만 돈이 아깝지 않은 게임.
focckinn awesum , i recommend this game for anyone who really into problem solving and sci-fi
Найс игрушка)!
Oyun harika. Boş bir puzle oyunu gibi dursada hikayesi sonradan ciddiye sarıyor. Tamam belki fazla aksiyon yok ama sizi içine aldığı anda etkileniyor, şaşırıyor ve tek oturuşta bitiriyorsunuz.
Lyhyt helpo mutta hyvä
유행의 흐름에서 벗어난 게임, 게임의 교육적 가치를 증명할 수 있는 게임

steam第一篇评测，献给Portal。
07年的游戏，18年玩着丝毫不觉得过时；之前已经先玩过portal2，所以对一代中的剧情和游戏系统有所了解，玩着还是很连贯的；4小时全部通关，难度有一点儿（但明显简单于二代），需要动动脑子，但自己琢磨琢磨也多用不了几分钟，玩着也不是很累（不过朋友在旁边看着说头晕，故建议玩的时候尽量找个凉快些的环境，别太闷2333；还有，晕３D者慎入吧）
英文有基础的强烈建议在最后把语言调成英文，片尾曲超好听，就是带着翻译腔的歌词有些毁气氛2333（不过前面剧情的中文字幕倒是本土化得颇OK）
提醒一下，Portal的OST是免费的喔！
最后再强调一遍，片尾曲超好听！
Lo mejor que podes hacer en tu vida es comprar este juego en oferta por solo medio dolar. Aunque no sea muy largo es genial. Emocionante :v.
Great game, well worth the money

Excelente juego!!! Divertido, bien redactado al español, muy recomendado si sos de esas personas que les gusta pensar con poco de adrenalina, es tu juego, no te dejes llevar si al principio es un poco tedioso, tiene mil maneras de jugar! Nunca te olvidare cubito de compañía...
Хорошая игра с интересным сюжетом. Её главный минус - маленькая компания, однако это проблему решат усложненные камеры и испытания, а также получение всех достижений! Игру рекомендую всем

Why are you still reading
This game is flawless
Just buy it already
bb

tengo una teoria:
la teoria esque la robot que te habla 
te quiere matar y tu te escapas 
donde la matas  y muere caendo en un precipisio
loved the games
Просто покажите геймплей учителю физики во время темы про Закон сохранения энергии и вы получите пять за урок
Dis game nos de wey
Canım benim <3
Extremadamente recomendado el 1 y el 2.
juego espectacular, una propuesta muy interesante, y ademas divertida, pasaras algunas muy buenas horas jugando este titulo, y al final querras que el juego fuese mas largo.
legal veleu muito apena e uma coisa que nao vo fazer tam sedo e zerar denov meu deus que jogo dificio

un juego con jugabilidad y muy adictiva.
recomendable si te gustan los juegos cortos.
the best soundtrack in the world
THE CAKE IS A LIE
it ver gud
круто, малинкое но крутое)
三个小时完成了，本来以为19关只是第一章的结尾，没想到只有一章。中间有卡过关卡，不过只要细心，善于观察通关并不难，所有的线索都在你来的路上，找不到前进的路，回头看看吧，秘籍可能就在你身后。最后的歌很好听，不过歌词翻译还不如百度翻译靠谱
İyi hikaye, iyi bulmacalar, iyi boss savaşı.

ЭТА ИГРА ЗОСТщАВЛА ГОРЕТЬ МОЮ ЖаПУ



 НА ГОЛОВОЛОМКАХ (НО ЭТО НЕ ТОЧНО )
Zeka ve sabır gerektiren bir oyun
Increible

This might not be as good or have the same amount of content as Portal 2, but it is still a great game nonetheless. It has a great story and those graphics look great for its time. I would advise that you purchase this in the portal bundle before you consider play the sequel as it is key to understanding what happended in portal 2. Finally don't forget "the cake is a lie"
I would definitely recommend this game to a friend. It is very unique in its design, invigorates one's mind, and enhances one's critical thinking.

Год назад я купил эту игру. Здесь я встретил нового друга. Поначалу он был не много замкнутым, как квадрат. Мне пришлось его убить((( Но потом, прогуливаясь по парку, я уже было забыл о нём, но увидел его на крыше одного здания. Он хотел прыгать. И сейчас я всего лишь прошу меня поздравить, потому что через месяц у нас свадьба.
10 новых друзей кубиков с сердечком из 10
The cake is a lie.
Zerei, e recomendo muito!!

Excelente juego los puzzles entretenidos, va desde lo mas facil hasta desafios complejos. Los portales son el acertijo a todo, esta jugabilidad es unica y ahora comprendo su fama sin duda un excelente juego por cierto los graficos muy buenos y optimizados. Valve sin duda realizo un excelente juego y en cierta forma es un primo lejano de Half life ya que se ambienta en el mismo lore, compralo cuando este en rebajas.
Filled the 9 hours i had of free time eaisily!
aunque el juego sea corto vale la pena comprarlo,aparte de que te demorara mucho tiempo completarlo al 100% con los mapas de bonificacion y es dificil
It was awesome, short but awesome.
Good game.
Great game, just a bit short

Sanat eseri...
Oynanış bakımından çok özgün. Dış sesin kim olduğunu bilmeden yönlendirilmek olaya bir gizem katıyor. Bölümlerde her ne kadar  aynı malzemeleri kullansak da her bölümün kendine özgü bir matığı var. Tek bir silahla oyun bitiriyorsunuz ve bu durumdan hiç şikayetçi değilsiniz. Özellikle konuşmalar sıradan bir oyunun çok ötesinde, zaman zaman esprili, zaman zaman korkutucu. Oyun sonu ise tam bir sürpriz. Kaliteli ve oyun dünyasında klasik sayılabilecek eserlerden.
Oooooh this game is just fire! Who didn't know, Half-Life is connected to Aperture! Well, this is for those who did not know) and the game is fire))
bence efsane ama 2inci daha güzel.
Just play it

Hát most hogy végeztem.... hűűűűűűűű. 
Nos abban az esetben ajánlom a játékot, ha valaki csak végig szeretne menni rajta egyszer és kész. Akkor szórakoztató, a logikai feladatok se rosszak, bár nem kifejezetten nehéz szerintem. VISZONT!!! Ha valaki olyan kényszeres, mint én, hogy muszáj megcsinálnia a teljesítményeket, akkor felejtős a dolog. Meg lehet csinálni hosszú órák alatt majd szétdurranó fejjel, de nem egy kellemetlen pillanatot okozott ez a kis csoda. Inkább ajánlom, de hacsak valaki nem hiper mazochista, akkor szerintem hagyja ki az úgymond "jutalompályákat".... azok felértek inkább egy kínzásssal.....
先玩的二代，忍不住回来补一代。真·良心游戏，两块钱买不了吃亏买不了上当。当然我还是要说一句二代有合作有创意工坊更好玩，六块钱也买不了吃亏买不了上当。
GLaDOS' Song = Instant 10 out of 10

머리가 좋아지는 이느낌!!~~
친구랑 함께하면 두배로 재밌어지는 퍼즐게임^^
정말 재밌습니다

Harika, tek kelimeyle harika. Uzun zamandır aradığım oyun burnumun dibindeymiş. İndirimlerde Orange Pack alma şansını yakaladım ve kütüphanme birbirinden güzel oyunlar kazandırdım. Mutlaka almanız gereken oyunlardan.

This game is SO Amazing. I bought it when it was on sale, but I would gladly given 10 euro for it. 
This is a game, that came before big open worlds, loot crates all over the place, and when you bought a game, you would get the hole game. Sure, you can fell it is an old game, but it is a game, that still stands strong to this day.
The puzzles are just great, the humor is great, and GLaDOS is just AMAZING! 
This is a must play game. Would totally recommend it. The only bad thing, is it’s length. It took me about 3 hours to complete the game, but it is still really good!
8,5/10
Yes
will always be one of the best classics
GLaDOS唱歌真好听
BAŞARIM AÇMAK İÇİN

Wonderful game overall... Play the next chapter PORTAL 2
Do I reccomend this game, YES!

This game was really terrifying. In a good way! Honestly, the puzzles became harder to solve and think through simply because I was scared throughout the second half. It's going to take me a while to be build up the courage to play the sequel because I'm such a coward, whoo boy.
Збс игра
Buen juego, pero es más corto que la polla de un travesti.

I've played this puzzle game several times over the years and its still one of my favorites! If there were such a thing as an action puzzle game, this would be it. Almost none of the puzzles ever left me frustrated or feeling like "How was I supposed to figure that out??". It truly is a near-masterpiece in gaming. 

...

...(And its 100 times better than Half-Life 2)!
recomendado pero en oferas, no te durara mas de 2 horas las historia, y talvez lo uses maximo 12 horas en completar todos  los logros

Há certos jogos que nao precisam de tramas muito elaboradas nem muitos efeitos especiais para ser bom, basta a ideia e a mecanica do jogo serem boas, aki temos um claro exemplo disto.

Exelente jogo de puzzles!!

Well... What you havn't played this game yet?! It's a classic, its a go-to game for pc gamers old and new. It's a puzzle platformer where ya do... Puzzles, with Portals! It has a great story, making you thirst for a sequel Oh wait that exists and is amazing too. Seeing as this isnt a review for the sequel lets get into it.

Portal, the 1st person puzzle platformer of the year, decade, heck maybe even century. With an amazing story, soundtrack, and most importantly, Puzzles. some can be easy and give you a break from the mind-boggling Difficult ones. None of the puzzles are extremely hard, a child ccould beat the game if ya gave them enough time. I loved this game, and so did alot of other people. The voice acting of GLADoS is incredibley funny at points,and her song is phenomenol. I loved this game, if i had any puzzle game to talk about, this would be it. 



If you havent already, Go buy it, i found the two games in a bundle for $2, take that as ya will, but this game gets incredibly low priced during holidays.


Portal, The Puzzle Platformer of the Score


Go buy it, its great.
tão bom quanto o 2 só queria que não fosse curto assim
pretty decent game, its a puzzle game, good if youre not in to fast pace action shooter. only buy if 5 dollars or under homies!
melhor jogo
The most dramatic moment was when I had to get rid of my Companion Cube ;-; Overall, this is one of the best games Valve has ever made, love it! 9.5/10.

It's admittedly a short game (it took me three and a half hours), but it packs a good punch for that short time. The puzzles are really solid and intuitive, and GLaDOS has some great lines. I also got 260 to 300 fps, which is a nice plus.
Uno de los mejores juegos que probe.. y pensar que no lo habia jugando nunca, me  encanto! distinto a todo, gran sentido del humor! un juego fantastico, ahora le toca al 2 ;-)
Fait en 2017, le jeu est un peu daté techniquement, mais le concept et le gameplay n'ont pas pris une ride! Un excellent puzzle game en vue FPS.
The Cake Is A Lie!
Why you should buy this? Well, why not ?
